snippet.title: Afterparty | Gameplay E3 2018
snippet.description:
In Afterparty, you are Milo and Lola, recently deceased best buds who suddenly find themselves staring down an eternity in Hell. But there's a loophole: outdrink Satan and he'll grant you re-entry to Earth. Coming October 29, 2019.

Wishlist Afterparty on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/762220/Afterparty/

Visit AfterpartyGame.com to stay up-to-date: http://www.afterpartygame.com

Music By:
SCNTFC 
OXENFREE, Galak-Z, Superbrothers: Sword & Sworcery EP

Night School is an independent studio. We make stories, games, and story games. Established in 2014 by Telltale and Disney alumni with a penchant for entertainment filled with wonder, danger, and humor.

www.nightschoolstudio.com
